title: Major Flooding in Western Kenya
description: Severe flooding has affected several counties in Western Kenya, causing displacement and damage to infrastructure. Emergency services are on alert.

title: Building Collapse in Nairobi
description: A residential building collapsed in Nairobi's Eastleigh neighborhood, trapping several people. Rescue operations are ongoing.

title: Fire Outbreak at Local Market
description: A fire broke out at the Kenyatta Market in Nairobi, destroying several stalls. Firefighters managed to contain the blaze, but damages are extensive.

title: Accident on the Nairobi-Mombasa Highway
description: A multi-vehicle accident occurred on the Nairobi-Mombasa highway, leading to traffic congestion and several injuries. Authorities are investigating the cause.

title: Health Ministry Issues Warning on Dengue Fever
description: The Ministry of Health has issued a warning about an outbreak of dengue fever in coastal regions. Citizens are urged to take preventive measures.
